function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Proper disposal of used disinfectants to avoid possible contact with humans","Impact":"Risk of contamination and exposure to harmful chemicals if disinfectants are not properly disposed","Mitigation":"Implement proper disposal procedures for used disinfectants, and provide training on their safe handling and disposal","Technologies":"Waste disposal systems, chemical neutralization technologies","People":"Building maintenance staff, waste management personnel","Owner":"Building management, waste management department"},{"Description":"Identification and cleaning of high-touch surfaces and occupied spaces","Impact":"Potential for disease transmission and spread if high-touch surfaces and occupied spaces are not cleaned effectively","Mitigation":"Develop a comprehensive cleaning plan for high-touch surfaces and frequently occupied spaces, and ensure regular cleaning using certified disinfectants","Technologies":"EPA List N certified disinfectants, surface cleaning technologies","People":"Cleaning staff, building maintenance personnel","Owner":"Facility management, cleaning services provider"},{"Description":"Selection of materials with antimicrobial properties","Impact":"Risk of surface contamination and transmission of viruses if materials are not antimicrobial","Mitigation":"Ensure the use of certified antimicrobial materials from approved lists and cover a high percentage of surfaces with antimicrobial material","Technologies":"Antimicrobial materials, surface treatment technologies","People":"Construction teams, building material suppliers","Owner":"Construction project manager, building owner"}]}
